data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 9587, Version Hash: 287033c755e0b326f6428f42d4f6c718c27ae51f
data.actual_result: The Discord app will crash with the crash error in the Greek language
data.expected_result: The Discord app should switch to the Greek language
data.short_description: When someone wants to switch language, if he choose the Greek language the client will crash, no matter what
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Go to Language - Select the Greek language
